Title: Apaharan
Writer: Prakash Jha (dialogue), Prakash Jha (screenplay), Prakash Jha (story), Shridhar Raghavan (screenplay), Manoj Tyagi (screenplay)
Actors: Ajay Devgn, Nana Patekar, Bipasha Basu, Ayub Khan
Plot: Story of a tumultuous and complex relationship between a father (Mohan Agashe) and son (Ajay Devgan), set against the backdrop of a thriving kidnapping industry in the Hindi heartland of Bihar.
